repository.corpname: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries

did.abstract: Founded by Carlton J. Bates (1848-1941) in 1907, the C.J. Bates Company manufactured manicure sets, crochet hooks, and knitting needles in Chester, Connecticut.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: Founded by Carlton J. Bates ( 1848-1941) in 1907, the C.J. Bates Company manufactured manicure sets, crochet hooks, and knitting needles in Chester, Connecticut.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of financial ledgers, purchase books, share certificates, and account summaries.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p: Ledgers are arranged by type and then chronologically.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item, Folder #], C.J. Bates Company Records. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Donated to Archives & Special Collections in August 2000 by the Chester Historical Society.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open and available for research.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use and Copyright Information
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to Connecticut business records. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the Reading Room desk.
